name: Wood Puzzle Game
description:
Enjoy the pleasure of crushing wood. An Addicting and Mania Wood Brick PUZZLE game.

We really hope you enjoy it!
Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay.
This game is a sure treat for any puzzle lover.
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
Fill Wood Block Puzzle can help you train your brain and keep you mentally fit everyday
Wood Puzzle Block is classical and very interesting with very nice graphics design.

---HOW TO PLAY---
Blocks can't be rotated.
Drag the wood blocks to move them.
Place the pieces into board.
Try to fit them all in the row or column.
Then the block will be clear and you get the point.
The Wood block will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the grid.
It’s the wooden jigsaw making your brain healthy for a happy life.

CHILL & RELAXING BOARD GAME!

BLOCK PUZZLE DELUXE CRUSH.

EXCELLENT & CLASSIC WOOD BLOCK PUZZLE!

SIMPLISTIC, CHALLENGING, INTRIGUING JIGSAW PUZZLE!!!

You can play anytime and anywhere! You will surely love this wood block puzzle mania game.
Quickly , let's try the game.
